hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.name: Valery
hero.description: Turning complex ideas into elegant and functional solutions. Over 2 years of experience in web development.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Fullstack Developer from Rostov-on-Don
about.text1: I've been doing web development since 2023. I specialize in creating full-fledged web applications using modern technologies.
about.text2: My approach combines attention to detail, commitment to creating clean and maintainable code, and understanding of business needs.
about.text3: Currently, I'm also developing my own project Jammer - a platform for independent game developers.

jammer.title: Jammer
jammer.description: Platform for independent game developers, similar to itch.io. Full-featured marketplace with game upload, sales, and review systems.

purmarili.title: Purmarili
purmarili.description: Web application for a restaurant chain in Rostov-on-Don. Includes custom admin panel for content management.

elina.title: GK "Elina"
elina.description: Web application for real estate sales in Rostov region and new republics. Filtering system, maps, administrative panel.

trucker.title: Backend Developer
trucker.description: Working on client configurations in Customer Technologies Team. Development and maintenance of backend part of projects.

jammer.title: Fullstack Developer & Co-founder
jammer.description: Technical lead and one of the project founders. Developing a platform for independent game developers from scratch.

viomitra.title: Frontend Developer
viomitra.description: Development of online auction service. Mentoring interns, participation in microservices development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Contact me and we'll discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life.
